item.title: 2026 College Football Transfer Portal Tracker: Indiana QB Alberto Mendoza Enters
item.description: The college football transfer portal opened on Jan. 2, but players didn't wait until then to announce their intentions to enter it.

item.title: What's Next: How Should Texans Approach C.J. Stroud’s Future After Playoff Flameout?
item.description: Texans QB C.J. Stroud becomes extension-eligible this offseason. Here's how Houston should approach his contract situation.

item.title: Indiana HC Curt Cignetti on QB Fernando Mendoza: 'He Has the Heart of a Lion'
item.description: Following Indiana's National Championship triumph, Hoosiers coach Curt Cignetti raved about his quarterback, Fernando Mendoza.

item.title: Who is Charlie Becker? What to Know About Emerging Indiana Hoosiers Receiver
item.description: Charlie Becker starred in Indiana's College Football Playoff championship win over Miami. Here's what to know about the receiver.

item.title: Favorite 'Dogs: Why Broncos, Rams Can Win Conference Title Matchups
item.description: Will Hill makes his case for why this weekend's underdogs — the Broncos and Rams — are capable of advancing to the Super Bowl.
